energyTips.body: Harness solar energy by from solar panels along the tube
Use regenerative braking to recover energy during deceleration
Optimize energy usage through real-time data monitoring and predictive maintenance
Use intelligent route planning to ensure efficient operation based on demand

funFacts.fact: Hyperloop could reduce travel time between cities to minutes.
Hyperloop pods can travel at speeds of over 1000 km/h.
The technology behind Hyperloop is based on magnetic levitation.
